entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 10:59 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:59 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:59 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
